TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit OrderablePartitioner`1<TSource> extends System.Collections.Concurrent.Partitioner`1<!TSource>
Public MustInherit Class OrderablePartitioner(Of TSource) Inherits Partitioner(Of TSource)
generic <typename TSource> public ref class OrderablePartitioner abstract : System::Collections::Concurrent::Partitioner<TSource>

span.span: Type of the elements in the collection.

summary.span: 代表將可排序的資料來源分割成多個分割的特定方式。

span.span: Represents a particular manner of splitting an orderable data source into multiple partitions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別的實作會負責為索引鍵 / 值組，適合的方式排序項目。The implementation of the derived class is responsible for ordering the elements into key-value pairs in whatever manner is appropriate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自訂 Partitioner](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何實作可排序的 partitioner 會一次傳回一個項目：The following example shows how to implement an orderable partitioner that returns one element at a time: [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.orderablepartitioner/cs/orderablepartitioner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.orderablepartitioner/vb/orderablepartitioner.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公用成員是安全執行緒，並可能會從多個執行緒同時呼叫。

span.span: All public members of are thread-safe and may be called from multiple threads concurrently.

related.span: 如何：加速小型迴圈主體

span.span: How to: Speed Up Small Loop Bodies

MemberSignature.Value: protected OrderablePartitioner (bool keysOrderedInEachPartition, bool keysOrderedAcrossPartitions, bool keysNormalized);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool keysOrderedInEachPartition, bool keysOrderedAcrossPartitions, bool keysNormalized) cil managed
Protected Sub New (keysOrderedInEachPartition As Boolean, keysOrderedAcrossPartitions As Boolean, keysNormalized As Boolean)
protected: OrderablePartitioner(bool keysOrderedInEachPartition, bool keysOrderedAcrossPartitions, bool keysNormalized);

param.name: keysOrderedInEachPartition
param.span: 指出每個分割中的項目是否依照增加索引鍵的順序產生。

span.span: Indicates whether the elements in each partition are yielded in the order of increasing keys.

param.name: keysOrderedAcrossPartitions
param.span: 指出舊有分割中的項目是否永遠位於較新分割中之項目的前面。

span.span: Indicates whether elements in an earlier partition always come before elements in a later partition.

param.span: 如果為 true，則分割 0 中每一個項目的順序索引鍵都會小於分割 1 中的任何項目，而分割 1 中每個項目的順序索引鍵也都會小於分割 2 中的任何項目，以此類推。

span.span: If true, each element in partition 0 has a smaller order key than any element in partition 1, each element in partition 1 has a smaller order key than any element in partition 2, and so on.

param.name: keysNormalized
param.span: 指出索引鍵是否已標準化。

span.span: Indicates whether keys are normalized.

param.span: 如果是 true，則所有順序索引鍵都是下列範圍內的相異整數：[0 .

span.span: If true, all order keys are distinct integers in the range [0 ..
numberOfElements-1].

param.span: 如果為 false，則順序索引鍵雖然一定還是相異，但這時只考慮其相對順序，而不考慮其絕對值。

span.span: If false, order keys must still be distinct, but only their relative order is considered, not their absolute values.

summary.span: 從衍生類別的建構函式中呼叫，以使用索引鍵上的已指定條件限制來初始化 類別。

span.span: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the class with the specified constraints on the index keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自訂 Partitioner](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!TSource> GetDynamicPartitions() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDynamicPartitions () As IEnumerable(Of TSource)

summary.span: 建立物件，這個物件可將基礎集合分割為數量不定的幾個部分。

span.span: Creates an object that can partition the underlying collection into a variable number of partitions.

returns.span: 可針對基礎資料來源建立分割的物件。

span.span: An object that can create partitions over the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的物件會實作介面。The returned object implements the interface. 呼叫物件上建立另一個磁碟分割序列。Calling on the object creates another partition over the sequence. 預設實作會提供相同的行為只不過傳回的資料分割集不會提供索引鍵的項目。The default implementation provides the same behavior as except that the returned set of partitions does not provide the keys for the elements. 方法時才支援屬性會傳回 true。The method is only supported if the property returns true. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自訂 Partitioner](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

exception.span: 基底類別不支援動態資料分割。

span.span: Dynamic partitioning is not supported by the base class.

exception.span: 必須在衍生類別中實作。

span.span: It must be implemented in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<int64, !TSource>> GetOrderableDynamicPartitions() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetOrderableDynamicPartitions () As IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of Long, TSource))

abstract member GetOrderableDynamicPartitions : unit -> seq<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<int64, 'Source>> override this.GetOrderableDynamicPartitions : unit -> seq<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<int64, 'Source>>

summary.span: 建立物件，這個物件可將基礎集合分割為數量不定的幾個部分。

span.span: Creates an object that can partition the underlying collection into a variable number of partitions.

returns.span: 可針對基礎資料來源建立分割的物件。

span.span: An object that can create partitions over the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的物件會實作介面。The returned object implements the interface. 呼叫物件上建立另一個磁碟分割序列。Calling on the object creates another partition over the sequence. 透過索引鍵 / 值組，每個資料分割會表示為列舉值。Each partition is represented as an enumerator over key-value pairs. 配對中的值是項目本身，以及索引鍵是用來決定其他項目對此元素的相對順序的整數。The value in the pair is the element itself, and the key is an integer which determines the relative ordering of this element against other elements. 方法時才支援屬性會傳回 true。The method is only supported if the property returns true. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自訂 Partitioner](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

exception.span: 這個 Partitioner 不支援動態資料分割。

span.span: Dynamic partitioning is not supported by this partitioner.

related.span: PLINQ 和 TPL 的自訂 Partitioner

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<int64, !TSource>>> GetOrderablePartitions(int32 partitionCount) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetOrderablePartitions (partitionCount As Integer) As IList(Of IEnumerator(Of KeyValuePair(Of Long, TSource)))

span.span: The number of partitions to create.

summary.span: 將基礎集合分割為指定數目的可排序分割。

span.span: Partitions the underlying collection into the specified number of orderable partitions.

returns.span: 包含 列舉程式的清單。

span.span: A list containing enumerators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過索引鍵 / 值組，每個資料分割會表示為列舉值。Each partition is represented as an enumerator over key-value pairs. 配對的值是項目本身，以及索引鍵是用來決定這個項目，針對資料來源中的其他元素的相對順序的整數。The value of the pair is the element itself, and the key is an integer which determines the relative ordering of this element against other elements in the data source. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自訂 Partitioner](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<!TSource>> GetPartitions(int32 partitionCount) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetPartitions (partitionCount As Integer) As IList(Of IEnumerator(Of TSource))

span.span: The number of partitions to create.

summary.span: 將基礎集合分割為指定的已排序分割數目。

span.span: Partitions the underlying collection into the given number of ordered partitions.

returns.span: 包含 列舉程式的清單。

span.span: A list containing enumerators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會提供相同的行為只不過傳回的資料分割集不會提供索引鍵的項目。The default implementation provides the same behavior as except that the returned set of partitions does not provide the keys for the elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自訂 Partitioner](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeysNormalized As Boolean
public: property bool KeysNormalized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指出順序索引鍵是否已標準化。

span.span: Gets whether order keys are normalized.

value.span: 如果索引鍵已標準化則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: true if the keys are normalized; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果傳回 true，所有的排序索引鍵是在範圍 [0] 中的相異整數：If returns true, all order keys are distinct integers in the range [0 .. numberOfElements-1]。numberOfElements-1]. 如果屬性傳回 false，仍然必須索引鍵的順序會不同，但只有其相對順序會被視為，不其絕對值。If the property returns false, order keys must still be distinct, but only their relative order is considered, not their absolute values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自訂 Partitioner](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeysOrderedAcrossPartitions As Boolean
public: property bool KeysOrderedAcrossPartitions { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指出舊有分割中的項目是否永遠位於較新分割中之項目的前面。

span.span: Gets whether elements in an earlier partition always come before elements in a later partition.

value.span: 如果舊有分割中的項目永遠位於較新分割中之項目的前面則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: true if the elements in an earlier partition always come before elements in a later partition; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果傳回 true，資料分割 0 中的每個項目具有較小順序索引鍵非資料分割 1，資料分割 1 中的每個項目中任何項目具有較小的排序索引鍵中的資料分割 2，依此類推的任何項目。If returns true, each element in partition 0 has a smaller order key than any element in partition 1, each element in partition 1 has a smaller order key than any element in partition 2, and so on. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自訂 Partitioner](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeysOrderedInEachPartition As Boolean
public: property bool KeysOrderedInEachPartition { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指出每個分割中的項目是否依照增加索引鍵的順序產生。

span.span: Gets whether elements in each partition are yielded in the order of increasing keys.

value.span: 如果每個分割中的項目都是依照遞增索引鍵順序產生則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: true if the elements in each partition are yielded in the order of increasing keys; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自訂 Partitioner](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).
